Instance.description: A SituationGoal representing X Sims simultaneously with the given buff.

Tunable.name: _give_goal_even_if_it_would_auto_pass
Tunable.display: Give Goal Even If It Would Auto Pass
Tunable.description: If checked then this goal will be given even if the goal would instantly complete. An example wanting this is the Play Date Where there is only one possible goal and we want to give the player the score for completing it.

TunableTuple.name: _goal_test
TunableTuple.description: A tunable defining a buff that is being shared by sim_count number of sims at the same time.

Tunable.name: buff_type
Tunable.description: The buff that we are hoping for the sims to have.

TunableVariant.name: sim_count
TunableVariant.description: The number of sims with the buff at the same time.

TunableTuple.name: fixed
TunableTuple.description: Required number of sims based on a fixed number.

Tunable.name: count
Tunable.description: A fixed count of how many sims are required (default).

TunableTuple.name: sims_in_situation
TunableTuple.description: Required number of sims is based on sims in the situation (optionally also with a given job).

TunableList.name: required_jobs
TunableList.description: If this list is non-empty then only sims with the given job(s) will be counted.

Tunable.name: _select_all_instantiated_sims
Tunable.description: If true, the goal system selects all instantiated sims in the zone.
